title: 怎么安装东方五难题mod?
author: zhanghongbin
txt_content:
如图例所示 装载MOD以后报错 求大神

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 截图只说明了加载该Mod失败，至于原因还需要你将崩溃信息贴出来

replies.author: zhanghongbin
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-6-1 13:12 编辑 
lichi2050 发表于 2016-6-1 00:48

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
zhanghongbin 发表于 2016-6-1 12:38
是这个吗？小白不太懂

---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
SampleSpellCardMod{1.00-1.7.2-2.71} [Sample Spell Card MOD] (SampleSpellCardMod ver1.00-1.7.2-2.71) 把这个删除或者更新，这个版本是1.7.2的，不兼容1.7.10

replies.author: zhanghongbin
replies.txt_content:
标题: RE: 安装东方五难题mod后无法启动服务器lichi2050 发表于 2016-6-1 20:12
SampleSpellCardMod{1.00-1.7.2-2.71} [Sample Spell Card MOD] (SampleSpellCardMod ver1.00-1.7.2-2.71 ...
好像还是不行，MOD本体好像不兼容似的

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
根据官方贴
1. Java 7
2. Forge (recommended version for 1.7.10)
你的Forge版本是10.13.3.1403，我建议你换成10.13.4.1558

replies.author: firespread
replies.txt_content: 服务器？要加MOD的话应该用MCPC的端
